statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

article.headline: Tyson Dunn hits go-ahead 3-pointer from corner and Buffalo takes down Old Dominion 83-82
article.description: — Tyson Dunn led Buffalo with 24 points, including a go-ahead 3-pointer with 1.3 seconds remaining, and the Bulls knocked off Old Dominion 83-82 on Monday night.
article.linkText: Tyson Dunn hits go-ahead 3-pointer from corner and Buffalo takes down Old Dominion 83-82

images.name: Tyson Dunn beats the buzzer to give Buffalo the win
images.caption: Tyson Dunn nails a three-pointer at the buzzer to give Buffalo the win over Old Dominion.

video.headline: Tyson Dunn beats the buzzer to give Buffalo the win
video.caption: Tyson Dunn nails a three-pointer at the buzzer to give Buffalo the win over Old Dominion.
video.title: Tyson Dunn beats the buzzer to give Buffalo the win
video.description: Tyson Dunn nails a three-pointer at the buzzer to give Buffalo the win over Old Dominion.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Tyson Dunn beats the buzzer to give Buffalo the win) 2024/11/04 ESHEET

article.story: NORFOLK, Va. -- — Tyson Dunn led Buffalo with 24 points, including a go-ahead 3-pointer with 1.3 seconds remaining, and the Bulls knocked off Old Dominion 83-82 on Monday night. Dunn also had six rebounds and 10 assists for the Bulls. Bryson Wilson scored 15 points while going 7 of 11 from the field. Ben Michaels shot 5 of 7 from the field and 2 of 5 from the free-throw line to finish with 13 points. The Monarchs were led by Robert Davis Jr., who recorded 25 points. Stephaun Walker added 14 points and 13 rebounds for Old Dominion. Devin Ceaser finished with 13 points. Dunn put up 12 points in the first half for Buffalo, who led 43-38 at the break. ------ The Associated Press created this story using technology provided by Data Skrive and data from Sportradar.

videos.headline: Tyson Dunn beats the buzzer to give Buffalo the win
videos.description: Tyson Dunn nails a three-pointer at the buzzer to give Buffalo the win over Old Dominion.
